title: Morning Joe 7/1/21
description: The Morning Joe panel reports on Bill Cosby's release from prison after PA Supreme Court overturns conviction, the January 6 insurrection and the New York City mayoral race.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
